metadata.title: Jecheon Gym | Serious Training Only
metadata.description: The only high-end weight training gym in Jecheon. Features premium equipment from Arsenal Strength, Hammer Strength, and more.

hero.subtitle: Jecheon Gym is not for everyone.
hero.subtitle2: This space is exclusively for those who train seriously.

identity.title: Identity
identity.line1: We don't provide fancy interiors or comfortable lounges.
identity.line2: We focus solely on creating the best training environment.

rules.title: Message from Gym
rules.intro: This is a weight training specialized gym.

cardio.title: No cardio equipment available,
cardio.line1: For cardio-focused training, we recommend Winners Fitness in Sinbaek-dong, which offers excellent ventilation and cardio facilities.
cardio.line3: If you train seriously with weights, you won't have time for cardio.
cardio.line4: Train as if you'll crawl out.. No talking, just training.

mandatory.title: !MANDATORY!
mandatory.rule1: No outdoor shoes. Violators will be expelled!! CCTV recording
mandatory.rule2: (Don't make excuses like 'I changed in the car' or 'I changed downstairs'. It's obvious) We'll lend you shoes if you don't have any.
mandatory.rule3: Not organizing the weights you used = immediate expulsion!!
mandatory.rule4: BCAA, supplements, canned drinks, coffee, etc. - consume at tables only~!!

rules.training1: The best trainers and gym history won't do your workout for you~
rules.training2: This is a self-training facility. We never pressure anyone for PT,
rules.training3: We're a weight training specialist gym.

location.title: LOCATION & INFO
location.note: * Open year-round (Entry closes 1.5 hours before closing)
